mil5.3.11:1.5_0: Niggaho nāma, bhante nāgasena, hatthacchedo pādacchedo vadho bandhanaṁ kāraṇā māraṇaṁ santativikopanaṁ, na etaṁ vacanaṁ bhagavato yuttaṁ, na ca bhagavā arahati etaṁ vacanaṁ vattuṁ.
mil5.3.11:1.7_0: ‘ahiṁsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṁmivā’ti, tena hi ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṁ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.3.11:1.9_0: ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṁ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti, tena hi ‘ahiṁsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṁmivā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.3.11:1.10_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.11:2.2_0: ‘ahiṁsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṁmivā’ti, bhaṇitañca—
mil5.3.11:2.4_0: ‘Ahiṁsāya cara loke, piyo hohisi maṁmivā’ti sabbesaṁ, mahārāja, tathāgatānaṁ anumataṁ etaṁ, esā anusiṭṭhi, esā dhammadesanā, dhammo hi, mahārāja, ahiṁsālakkhaṇo, sabhāvavacanaṁ etaṁ.
mil5.3.11:2.6_0: ‘niggaṇhe niggahārahaṁ, paggaṇhe paggahārahan’ti, bhāsā esā, uddhataṁ, mahārāja, cittaṁ niggahetabbaṁ, līnaṁ cittaṁ paggahetabbaṁ.
mil5.3.11:2.7_0: Akusalaṁ cittaṁ niggahetabbaṁ, kusalaṁ cittaṁ paggahetabbaṁ.
mil5.3.11:2.8_0: Ayoniso manasikāro niggahetabbo, yoniso manasikāro paggahetabbo.
mil5.3.11:3.1_0: “Hotu, bhante nāgasena, idāni tvaṁ paccāgatosi mama visayaṁ, yamahaṁ pucchāmi, so me attho upagato.
mil5.3.11:3.2_0: Coro pana, bhante nāgasena, niggaṇhantena kathaṁ niggahetabbo”ti?
mil5.3.11:3.3_0: “Coro, mahārāja, niggaṇhantena evaṁ niggahetabbo, paribhāsanīyo paribhāsitabbo, daṇḍanīyo daṇḍetabbo, pabbājanīyo pabbājetabbo, bandhanīyo bandhitabbo, ghātanīyo ghātetabbo”ti.
mil5.3.11:3.4_0: “Yaṁ pana, bhante nāgasena, corānaṁ ghātanaṁ, taṁ tathāgatānaṁ anumatan”ti?
mil5.3.11:3.7_0: “Yo so, mahārāja, ghātīyati, na so tathāgatānaṁ anumatiyā ghātīyati, sayaṅkatena so ghātīyati, api ca dhammānusiṭṭhiyā anusāsīyati, sakkā pana, mahārāja, tayā purisaṁ akārakaṁ anaparādhaṁ vīthiyaṁ carantaṁ gahetvā ghātayitun”ti?
mil5.3.11:3.11_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, na coro tathāgatānaṁ anumatiyā haññati, sayaṅkatena so haññati, kiṁ panettha anusāsako kiñci dosaṁ āpajjatī”ti?
mil5.3.11:3.13_0: “Tena hi, mahārāja, tathāgatānaṁ anusiṭṭhi sammānusiṭṭhi hotī”ti.
